mapper.select: select notice_id, notice_title, notice_body from notice where notice_category='QA' order by notice_cre_date desc
select notice_id, user_id, notice_private, notice_title, notice_cre_date from notice where notice_category = 'user_quest'
mapper.insert: insert into notice ( notice_id, user_id, notice_category, notice_match_no, notice_parent_no notice_title, notice_type, notice_private, notice_pw, notice_body) values ( concat('notice_', nextval('notice')), #{user_id}, 'user_quest', , #{notice_title}, #{notice_type}, #{notice_private}, #{notice_pw}, #{notice_body})
